ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know - it s freaky, don t know how it happened, but I also don t want to take advantage of the guild, seeing as I want to join when I reach 30th (minimum
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:56 PM 7/2/2001 +0000, you wrote:
>What's wrong with having them kill a dragon? :)
>
>I think you'd be selling yourself short with the Tamborine.
>Depending how "near-uber" they are, they may have all sorts of Dragon
>loot laying around unused... I think even a Selo's Drum would be too
>little in exchange for this.
>
>It comes off King Tormax (I believe - you said you got it off an
>Akanon Quest?) and EQPrices lists it for 25k (low, imo). I'd ask for
>a Breath of Harmony or a Lute of the Howler.

I know - it's freaky, don't know how it happened, but I also don't want to
take advantage of the guild, seeing as I want to join when I reach 30th
(minimum requirement for me to join).

Is the Lute of the Howler tradeable? I thought it was nodrop...
hrm - I see that it is not.

How about this - request the Lute of the Howler (what's the worst he can
say? No?), and the ancient coins from Kaesora, Dalnir and City of
Mist? I've already got a bloodgill coin, and I see that the others are not
too hard. That would get me two out of four really good instruments, not
bad for a young bard...

Talies the Wanderer
